thread.title: Khloe Kardashian & Tristan Thompson enjoy romantic getaway | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Khloe Kardashian & Tristan Thompson enjoy romantic getaway | Daily Mail Online

author: Chelsea White For Dailymail.Com
title: Khloe Kardashian & Tristan Thompson enjoy romantic getaway | Daily Mail Online
text: 131 shares Walking along hand-in-hand, the couple could not stop laughing with one another. Their Saturday was full of action with the reality star and her basketball star beau heading to a zip-lining adventure at Mystic Mountain in Ocho Rios. Shine bright: As soon as the pair touched down on the island, they indulged in a candlelit dinner on the beach Loved up: Walking along hand-in-hand, the couple could not stop laughing with one another Khloe shared a video of Tristan suited up in his mandated harness and blue helmet. Obviously not shy, the Cleveland Cavs star opted to wear bright purple camouflage shorts and matching colored sneakers. While he looked a little goofy, he set Khloe's heart on fire, with the star saying: 'You look very handsome!' Hold on tight: Their Saturday was full of action with the reality star and her basketball star beau heading to a zip-lining adventure at Mystic Mountain in Ocho Rios The gun show: Khloe shared a video of Tristan suited up in his mandated harness and blue helmet, and said, 'You look very handsome!' Flamboyant fashion: Obviously not shy, the Cleveland Cavs star opted to wear bright purple camouflage shorts and matching colored sneakers Tristan joked: 'Yeah Baby you see me, Baby I'm ready.' After their heart pumping adventure, they headed to Olympian Usain Bolt's restaurant, Tracks And Record. On Sunday Usain shared a snap of the couple with their waitress on Instagram saying: 'Last night @khloekardashian and @realtristan13 visited us at #TracksAndRecords #Kingston to #TasteREALJamaicanVibes.' Did the bolt: After their heart pumping adventure, they headed to Olympian Usain Bolt's restaurant, Tracks And Record Star endorsement: On Sunday Usain shared a snap of the couple with their waitress on Instagram saying, 'Last night @khloekardashian and @realtristan13 visited us at #TracksAndRecords #Kingston to #TasteREALJamaicanVibes' Khloe, who was dressed in a black mini dress and trench coat with a white hat, then headed with her Gucci-wearing beau to the Fiction Fantasy nightclub. The pair joined revelers who were celebrating after the Youth View Awards, which has been described as the Teen Choice Awards of Jamaica. Sunday it was back to romance, as Khloe and Tristan took a sunset stroll along the beach. A post shared by @eltomsin on Feb 19, 2017 at 12:16am PST There Khloe found a horse and was blown away by its beauty. Sharing numerous snaps and videos of the animal, she said: 'This is so crazy! 'You are so beautiful just roaming the beach.' New friend: Sunday it was back to romance, as Khloe and Tristan took a sunset stroll along the beach, where they found a horse Fell in love: Sharing numerous snaps and videos of the animal, she said, 'This is so crazy! You are so beautiful just roaming the beach' Their getaway comes just a few after Khloe told the ladies of The Talk of her happiness with the relationship. 'It's really good. I'm in a really good place,' she said about her romance, which started late last year, with the 25-year-old NBA player. 'I feel really happy and secure and I'm just in a really positive, healthy relationship.' Designer pair: the couple flew with some seriously expensive luggage - two Goyard duffels, four Louis Vuitton bags and an Hermes handbag The E! star, who is based in Los Angeles, has been spending more and more time in Ohio with her beau and says she's really enjoying the change of scenery. 'I actually love Cleveland. Everyone is so nice there. I love the four seasons. I love that it snows. I spent Christmas there and it was â€” snow. I'm not used to that. 'And everyone is so nice and it's a normal - I love routine. It's a normal routine life. I love to cook, so I get to cook dinner every day. It's this home, family thing that I've been craving that I get to have in Cleveland.' 'I'm just in a really positive, healthy relationship': Their getaway comes just a few after Khloe told the ladies of The Talk of her happiness with the relationship
